com.yifanlu.Josh
Class ConsoleCursorInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.yifanlu.Josh.ConsoleCursorInfo

public class ConsoleCursorInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Contains information about the console cursor.

Since:
0.1
Version:
1.3, 05/29/10
Author:
Yifan Lu
See Also:
Windows' CONSOLE_CURSOR_INFO structure, JoshOutBuffer.getConsoleCursorInfo(), JoshOutBuffer.setConsoleCursorInfo(com.yifanlu.Josh.ConsoleCursorInfo)

Constructor Summary

          Creates a default cursor size of 25 that is visible.

          Creates a new cursor info object.

Constructor Detail

ConsoleCursorInfo

public ConsoleCursorInfo()
Creates a default cursor size of 25 that is visible.

ConsoleCursorInfo

public ConsoleCursorInfo(int size,
                         boolean visible)
Creates a new cursor info object.

Parameters:
size - The percentage of the character cell that is filled by the cursor. This value is between 1 and 100. The cursor appearance varies, ranging from completely filling the cell to showing up as a horizontal line at the bottom of the cell.
visible - The visibility of the cursor. If the cursor is visible, this member is true.
Method Detail

getSize

public int getSize()
Gets the size.

Returns:
The percentage of the character cell that is filled by the cursor. This value is between 1 and 100. The cursor appearance varies, ranging from completely filling the cell to showing up as a horizontal line at the bottom of the cell.

getVisible

public boolean getVisible()
Gets the visibility.

Returns:
The visibility of the cursor. If the cursor is visible, this member is true.

setSize

public void setSize(int size)
Sets the size.

Parameters:
size - The percentage of the character cell that is filled by the cursor. This value is between 1 and 100. The cursor appearance varies, ranging from completely filling the cell to showing up as a horizontal line at the bottom of the cell.

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean visible)
Sets the visibility.

Parameters:
visible - The visibility of the cursor. If the cursor is visible, this member is true.
